article_title: Reduced IRS Audits? Actually, IRS Cuts Corners, Audits Faster, Bills Sooner

article_metadata.description: Think IRS budget cuts mean no more audits? Think again. Actually, budget cuts may contribute to a new brutal speed at the IRS that may shortcut taxpayer rights.
article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood
